alert.note: Alert for George; Greene; Perry; Stone (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 15 at 6:23PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern George, southern Perry, southwestern Greene and northeastern Stone Counties through 700 PM CDT... At 621 PM CDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm over McLain, or 17 miles west of Leakesville, moving southwest at 15 mph. Another strong storm was noted about 10 miles south of New Agusta, also moving southwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Beaumont and McLain. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
